tool_description: Develops personalized improvement plans with specific goals, timelines, resources, and practice recommendations based on performance assessment.

current_skill_level.description: Current proficiency level: beginner, intermediate, advanced

target_skill_level.description: Desired proficiency level: intermediate, advanced, expert

time_commitment.description: Weekly time availability: light, moderate, intensive

job_focus.description: Target job role for focused improvement

error_messages: Invalid skill levels: Use beginner/intermediate/advanced for current; intermediate/advanced/expert for target
Timeline out of range: Specify timeline_weeks between 1 and 52
Invalid time commitment: Use one of [light, moderate, intensive]
Empty development areas: Provide at least one area for improvement
Incompatible skill progression: Target level must be higher than current level
usage: Provide development_areas, current_skill_level, and target_skill_level. Optionally set timeline_weeks, time_commitment, learning_preferences, and job_focus for personalized planning.
